## PopulatableEthersLiquity.unstakeUniTokens() method

Withdraw Uniswap ETH/1USD LP tokens from liquidity mining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                     | Description                      |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------- |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)                                   | Amount of LP tokens to withdraw. |
| overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |                                  |
